visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly rainfall data for a year. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend should be set.
visualization_explanation: The Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis displays the months of the year with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 12px. The y-axis is labeled 'Rainfall (mm)' with a similar style, and its title is also styled in medium gray with a font size of 14px. The data series represents the monthly rainfall data, with a custom color of '#0073e6' applied to the series. Additional configurations include setting the chart's right margin to 120 pixels and a light gray background color. The legend is positioned to the right, vertically aligned at the top, and laid out vertically with specific x and y coordinates.
